H

hash - Variable in class ml.alternet.security.auth.formats.CryptParts
The hash field maybe initialized after parsing when the purpose of the crypt is for checking some credentials, or left blank on creation when the purpose of the crypt is to compute a hash (then set with the hash result before formatting a string representation of this parts).

L

LOG_ROUNDS_PROPERTY_NAME - Static variable in interface ml.alternet.security.auth.Hasher.Builder
The standard property name "logRounds" (for BCrypt only) ; the log2 of the number of rounds of hashing to apply - the work factor therefore increases as 2**log_rounds.

UNIXCRYPT_FORMATTER - Static variable in class ml.alternet.security.auth.hashers.impl.UnixCryptHasher
The Unix Crypt formatter : 2 characters salt followed by the hash, each character encoded in the h64 encoder value space.
UnixCryptFormat - Class in ml.alternet.security.auth.formats
Legacy Unix Crypt Formats : A des-crypt hash string consists of 13 characters, drawn from [./0-9A-Za-z] :
password -> JQMuyS6H.AGMo A fallback to MD5 32 hexa character hash :
11fbe079ed3476f7712030d24042ca35
